show_name: Chō Seimeitai Transformers: Beast Wars Neo (TV)
other_title: Super Lifeform Transformers Beat Wars Neo
超生命体トランスフォーマー ビーストウォーズ・ネオ (Japanese)
plot: Although Lioconvoy managed to stop Galvatron's plans for exploiting the powerful Angolmois energy, the Destrons refused to be deterred. Rallied by their new leader, the Destrons are attacking entire galactic quadrants in a hunt for the scattered capsules of Angolmois. In response, the Cybertron elders appoint a powerful leader to gather a team of heroes and stop the Destrons' plans. However, both sides of the conflict are being manipulated by the agents of Unicron, who desire the Angolmois energy in order to revive their fallen master.
opening_theme: "Love For Ever: Kimi o Mamoru Tame ni" by M.C.R
ending_theme: "Te no Naka no Uchū" by Hitomi Yūki
